Posts.Content: Age 65. Menopaused. Invasive Ductal Carcinoma. Grade 2 FNAC done My mother just had a biopsy done and the results came yesterday. The doctors recommended further tests and surgery. However we are not keen in doing the surgery in Bangladesh and are planning to take her to India and we are in the process of applying for medical visa. now, we are torn between choosing treatment center. kolkata is closer to us and will be better for follow up treatments. But most people we know are referring Chennai. Can i get your good thoughts between kolkata and chennai treatments? We were planning to take appointment from Apollo kolkata or Chennai. Does anyone have any experience over there that they can share? Thanks for your thougths
Posts.Title: Breast cancer treatment in India

Posts.Content: hi my mother 65 just diagnosed with breast cancer grade 2. had only fnac done and took immidiate decision conduct treatment in india. so applied for visa today from Bangladesh. hopefully will fly out to Apollo hospitals in chennai. my diellema is which doctor to take appointment from and what is the service like in that hospital. should see a surgical oncolpgist first? would be very grateful if anybody had any firdt hand experience of self or relatives to share and give some pointers...
Posts.Title: Breast cancer treatment in India

Posts.Content: Age 65. Menopaused. Invasive Ductal Carcinoma. Grade 2 FNAC done My mother just had a biopsy done and the results came yesterday. The doctors recommended further tests and surgery. Posts.Title: cancer treatment in India

Posts.Content: Hello Indy, she only had ultrasonogram and needle biopsy done..we will do the rest at India since they will not recognize any of these tests done in bangladesh
